item.title: Flight Management Computer Systems (FMCS) – FMC Annunciator Light

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided CDU MSG light and EICAS Advisory message FMC MESSAGE are verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard "FMC Annunciator LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: This test uses two people, one in the flight deck and one in the main equipment center.

numlitem.para: On P11 circuit breaker panel open the following circuit breaker - FMCS RIGHT(LEFT) E-30(E-9).
On the left(right) FMC CDU - push the clear key until all the messages are clear.
On the E2 rack left(right) FMC front face - push and hold the TEST button.
On the upper EICAS screen - make sure the message FMC MESSAGE appears.
On the left(right) FMC CDU - the MSG light is illuminated.
On the E2 rack left(right) FMC front face - release the TEST button.
On P11 circuit breaker panel close the following circuit breaker - FMCS CMPTR RIGHT(LEFT) E-30(E-9).
Repeat test steps 1 thru 7 on right FMC with left FMC disabled using data in parentheses.
